author: FOX 17 News
title: John Ball Zoo mourns passing of 55-year-old chimp
text:
GRAND RAPIDS, Mich. ‚Äî John Ball Zoo (JBZ) announced the passing of one of their chimpanzees Wednesday.
Peggy was 55 when caregivers noticed her health was declining. They kept a close watch on her and administered medicated treatment but were unable to save her.
We‚Äôre told Peggy had been at the zoo since April 2001 after spending 17 years at the Cleveland Zoo and 12 years at the Detroit Zoo.
JBZ describes Peggy as their ‚Äúsassy elder‚Äù who made ‚Äúsweet faces‚Äù and had an identifiable scream.
‚ÄúPeggy left a lasting impact on her fellow chimps and those who cared for her,‚Äù the zoo writes. ‚ÄúWith female chimpanzees living around 40 years in AZA-accredited institutions, we feel incredibly fortunate to have shared 24 of Peggy‚Äôs remarkable 55 years with her.‚Äù
JBZ extends its gratitude to those who offered their support.
Follow FOX 17: Facebook - X (formerly Twitter) - Instagram - YouTube

author: Dec ; A Minghui Correspondent
title: Chinese Residents Sincerely Wish Master Li a Happy New Year | Falun Dafa - Minghui.org
text: (Minghui.org) Falun Dafa has for the past 31 years not only guided practitioners with the principles of Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance, but also inspired everyday citizens in China to be good people, which has brought them blessings such as health, safety, and much more. They sent their greetings to the Minghui.org website, to thank Master Li, the founder of Falun Dafa, and wish him a Happy New Year! Learning to Be Tolerant Lan, who lives in the Tongzhou District in Beijing, described something she experienced on December 2, 2023. ‚ÄúAt 4 p.m. that day, a woman with an accent [not from Beijing] called me out at work saying that my bag damaged her strawberries. I went outside and saw my bag which was in my bike basket was neatly placed on a plate of strawberries,‚Äù she wrote in her letter. ‚ÄúI knew this woman was an accident faker (someone who stages accidents to extort money). I then remembered in a DVD called Coming for You, that a Falun Dafa practitioner who bought a thermos returned 10 yuan to the cashier who mistakenly undercharged him. So I decided to be a good person like that practitioner and bought the strawberries from this accident faker.‚Äù When she headed home that day, Lan felt peaceful with an open mind, and she also recited, ‚ÄúFalun Dafa is good‚Äù and ‚ÄúTruthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance is good,‚Äù as recommended by the DVD. ‚ÄúAfter I came home, I suddenly realized that the running nose that had bothered me for a week had stopped. Not only that, the ‚Äòdamaged‚Äô strawberries were not bruised. Falun Dafa is truly extraordinary!‚Äù she continued. ‚ÄúI know that these were blessings because of my kind thoughts. Thank you Master Li, and I wish you a Happy New Year!‚Äù Retired Village CCP Secretary Sees Hope in Falun Dafa Wei was the village‚Äôs Chinese Communist Party (CCP) Secretary for 28 years in Yantai City, Shandong Province. In the beginning, he had a simple thought of doing things for people without fighting for his own personal gains. Local residents all supported him and he was reelected again and again. ‚ÄúBut later on I found I could not continue any longer. The CCP became so rotten that one always had to lie in order to please higher officials; otherwise, you were not a good official. In addition, one has to pay bribes here and there; otherwise, you cannot get anywhere with the village projects. I was frustrated, but I could not figure out why,‚Äù he wrote in his letter. After reading [truth clarification] materials distributed by Falun Dafa practitioners, Wei gradually understood what was happening in China. ‚ÄúThe society is experiencing a moral decay, and it‚Äôs really alarming if things continue like this,‚Äù Wei wrote. ‚ÄúMaster Li introduced Falun Dafa and the principles of Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance to save us, but the CCP is undermining mankind by suppressing traditional values, including Falun Dafa‚Äôs teachings. That is why I admire Master Li and I fully support Falun Dafa practitioners! I also want to quit all the CCP organizations I am affiliated with, because I want to be a good person.‚Äù Village Official Criticizes the CCP Liang from Jingzhou County, Hunan Province, raised pigs, and he was elected a village official. In the countryside, there is a tradition of raising pigs. ‚ÄúBut under the totalitarian rule of the CCP, all pigsties were removed for so-called ‚Äòenvironmental protection‚Äô and we were not allowed to burn the stalks after we harvested the crops‚Äînot even the weeds. The high environmental pollution fines made it difficult for many small and medium-sized businesses,‚Äù Liang wrote. ‚ÄúBecause of the political propaganda of ‚Äòbuilding a modern countryside‚Äô, we are not allowed to build houses even on our own homesteads. Due to high fines, projects are left unfinished for years, and can be seen everywhere. People‚Äôs resentment against the CCP‚Äôs tyranny has boiled over.‚Äù As a village official, Liang was well aware that the CCP‚Äôs control and brutality against Falun Dafa was even more reckless. The CCP‚Äôs persecution and ‚Äúzero-out‚Äù campaigns are irrational, while the peaceful efforts of Falun Dafa practitioners have won more and more support. ‚ÄúWhen reading Master Li‚Äôs new articles, ‚ÄòHow Humankind Came To Be‚Äô and ‚ÄòWhy Save Sentient Beings‚Äô, I could feel his immense compassion of reviving traditional values and upholding morality. This will lead us to a better future. Thank you Master Li!‚Äù Blessings of Being Good People One resident of Changping District in Beijing said he knew that Falun Dafa practitioners were good people, and completely different from what the television media depicts. ‚ÄúI also listened to Master Li‚Äôs audio lectures, and everything in them is encouraging us to be good and better people,‚Äù the man wrote. ‚ÄúI have followed these principles at work and in my life. Thank you Master Li, and Happy New Year!‚Äù Gang, a resident in Zhaoyuan City, Shandong Province, said he was tired of seeing how corrupt the CCP officials are, but they continue mistreating innocent Falun Dafa practitioners. ‚ÄúNo one in our village says anything good about the Party. When village officials asked me to join the Party recently, I said no way! The CCP will meet its end for harming people and I don‚Äôt want to die with it,‚Äù he wrote in his greetings. ‚ÄúFalun Dafa and Master Li will save us. Thank you Master Li!‚Äù One resident in Jianping County, Liaoning Province, said some of his family members practice Falun Dafa, and he was encouraged to be a good person. ‚ÄúMany coworkers pick the easy tasks at work, but I will do whatever is needed to get the job done. I am not calculating my gains or losses, and often help out others. Because of that, I have a peaceful mind and good health. I am the only worker who was not infected during the pandemic. I sincerely thank Master Li for restoring traditional values, and hope he returns to China,‚Äù he wrote in his greetings. Ning, who lives in Qitaihe City, Heilongjiang Province, is not a Falun Dafa practitioner. She wrote, ‚ÄúBut I have seen how my child‚Äôs mother-in-law has miraculously survived a fatal illness because of Falun Dafa. I think I will practice later.‚Äù One practitioner in Baoding City, Hebei Province, said that when he told villagers about Falun Dafa, they were very supportive. ‚ÄúSome of them said they were not articulate, but asked me to pass on their sincere ts to Master Li and wish him a Happy New Year!‚Äù he wrote in the greetings. The family members of a practitioner in Tangshan City, Hebei Province, said that they are grateful to Falun Dafa and Master Li. ‚ÄúIn this society of uncertainty, Falun Dafa gives us assurance, hope, and blessings. Thank you Master Li!‚Äù A resident in Yantai City, Shandong Province said that she felt fortunate that her family members are able to practice Falun Dafa. She is very thankful and wishes Master Li a Happy New Year! Three residents from Jianping County in Liaoning Province said they witnessed how Falun Dafa helped their family members become better people. ‚ÄúWe always support Falun Dafa, and will forever stand with Dafa practitioners as well as Master Li. Words can‚Äôt describe how we cherish the principles of Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance. Thank you Master Li!‚Äù they wrote in their greetings. A greeting from Nanchong City, Sichuan Province, wrote: ‚ÄúDear Master Li, Happy New Year! Here we want to say Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance is truly wonderful. We everyday people will forever remember how great you are by introducing Falun Dafa to this world. From residents in Nanchong City, Sichuan Province‚Äù Additional greetings were received from:Baicheng City, Jilin ProvinceLiuyang City, Hunan ProvinceWuhan City, Hubei ProvinceChangping District, BeijingDalian City, Liaoning ProvinceSantai County, Sichuan Province Jianping County, Liaoning Province Copyright ¬© 1999-2023 Minghui.org. Content on this page may be reproduced with attribution. Category: [ Greetings ](/cc/31/)

author: AFP
title: Astr√¥nomos alertam sobre polui√ß√£o luminosa de projeto energ√©tico perto de telesc√≥pios no Chile
text:
MARTIN BERNETTI (Arquivo) T√©cnicos caminham ao lado de um telesc√≥pio auxiliar no Observat√≥rio Paranal, norte do Chile MARTIN BERNETTI
O Observat√≥rio Europeu do Sul (ESO, na sigla em ingl√™s) alertou nesta quinta-feira (9) sobre a amea√ßa que poderia representar para o funcionamento do observat√≥rio Paranal, no norte do Chile, a constru√ß√£o de um projeto para produzir hidrog√™nio e amon√≠aco verdes, devido √† polui√ß√£o luminosa.
Os cientistas acenderam o alerta diante do in√≠cio da tramita√ß√£o ambiental de um "megaprojeto" para produzir hidrog√™nio e amon√≠aco verdes por parte da empresa chilena AES Andes.
O projeto estaria localizado em Taltal, na regi√£o de Antofagasta, a entre cinco e 11 quil√¥metros de dist√¢ncia de Paranal, que abriga o Very Large Telescope, um dos instrumentos √≥ticos mais poderosos do mundo. Junto dele est√° sendo constru√≠do o Extremely Large Telescope, com capacidade ainda maior.
"As emiss√µes de poeira durante a constru√ß√£o, o aumento da turbul√™ncia atmosf√©rica e, especialmente, a polui√ß√£o luminosa, ter√£o um impacto irrepar√°vel nas capacidades de observa√ß√£o astron√¥mica", advertiu o diretor-geral do ESO, Xavier Barcons, em comunicado.
Paranal foi inaugurado em 1999 e fica em pleno deserto de Atacama, o mais √°rido do mundo e lugar ideal para a observa√ß√£o astron√¥mica por seu clima seco, grande altitude e aus√™ncia de nuvens e chuva.
O complexo √© parte da rede de observat√≥rios astron√¥micos que est√£o situados no Chile, entre eles o radiotelesc√≥pio Alma e o telesc√≥pio √≥tico de La Silla.
No fim de dezembro, a companhia AES Andes informou que o projeto inclui "a produ√ß√£o de hidrog√™nio e amon√≠aco verde, bem como o desenvolvimento de energia solar, e√≥lica e de armazenamento em baterias", em linha com o objetivo do Chile de ampliar a origem renov√°vel de sua matriz energ√©tica.
A AES Andes foi procurada pela AFP, mas n√£o fez coment√°rios.
Para Itziar de Gregorio, representante do ESO no Chile, "√© crucial considerar localidades alternativas para este megaprojeto que n√£o coloquem em perigo um dos tesouros astron√¥micos mais importantes do mundo".
Em outubro de 2024, entrou em vigor no Chile uma nova regra de luminosidade para proteger lugares pr√≥ximos aos observat√≥rios, mas tamb√©m a sa√∫de de pessoas e animais.
A normativa estabelece limites de luminosidade, hor√°rios m√°ximos de funcionamento de tel√µes publicit√°rios, al√©m de promover a transi√ß√£o para o uso de luz quente, que produz menos luminosidade.

author: UOL
title: Presidente uruguaio rejeita decis√£o que confirma reelei√ß√£o de Maduro
text: O presidente do Uruguai, Luis Lacalle Pou, considerou que a decis√£o da mais alta corte da Venezuela, que validou nesta quinta-feira (22) a reelei√ß√£o do presidente Nicol√°s Maduro, apenas confirma uma "fraude" eleitoral. "O regime de Maduro confirma o que a comunidade internacional vem denunciando: a fraude. Uma ditadura que fecha todas as portas para uma vida institucional e democr√°tica para o seu povo. N√£o devemos nos calar nem cessar na defesa da causa venezuelana", escreveu Lacalle Pou na rede social X. O Tribunal Supremo de Justi√ßa (TSJ) da Venezuela certificou "de forma inquestion√°vel" o resultado das elei√ß√µes de 28 de julho, emitido pelo Conselho Nacional Eleitoral (CNE), que proclamou Maduro como vencedor para o per√≠odo de 2025-2031 com 52% dos votos. A oposi√ß√£o afirma ter vencido as elei√ß√µes e acusa tanto o TSJ quanto o CNE de servirem a Maduro, no poder desde 2013. Liderados por Mar√≠a Corina Machado, os opositores afirmam que seu candidato, Edmundo Gonz√°lez Uruttia, venceu com 67% dos votos e publicaram c√≥pias das atas que, segundo eles, provam a vit√≥ria. Lacalle Pou questionou na pr√≥pria noite da elei√ß√£o a suposta vit√≥ria de Maduro e, posteriormente, o Uruguai foi um dos primeiros pa√≠ses a reconhecer a vit√≥ria de Gonz√°lez. O governo de Lacalle Pou e outros da regi√£o est√£o discutindo um comunicado conjunto criticando a decis√£o do TSJ, segundo fontes do Minist√©rio das Rela√ß√µes Exteriores do Uruguai. ad/arm/am ¬© Agence France-Presse

author: Nataly Barrera
title: El truco que utilizan ladrones para estafar por WhatsApp: ojo con estos mensajes
text:
En los √∫ltimos meses, se ha observado un aumento significativo en las [estafas realizadas a trav√©s de WhatsApp
](https://www.bluradio.com/tecnologia/estafas-por-whatsapp-asi-les-estan-robando-y-clonando-la-cuenta-a-los-colombianos-so35). Los ciberdelincuentes han perfeccionado sus t√©cnicas, utilizando m√©todos cada vez m√°s sofisticados para enga√±ar a los usuarios.
Es as√≠ como una de las nuevas estrategias que los delincuentes est√°n implementando se trata de suplantar la identidad del soporte t√©cnico de la aplicaci√≥n, buscando acceder a cuentas personales bancarias y estafar sus contactos.
As√≠ le ocurri√≥ Martha Pineda, quien fue v√≠ctima de suplantaci√≥n v√≠a WhatsApp, y cont√≥ a [Noticias Caracol
](https://www.noticiascaracol.com/colombia/bogota/ojo-con-mensaje-de-soporte-tecnico-a-esta-bogotana-le-robaron-el-whatsapp-y-5-000-contactos-cb20) que le lleg√≥ un mensaje, donde le preguntaban si estaba intentando ingresar desde un Open 16, que si era ella, a lo que respondi√≥ que no en el chat. "Me lleg√≥ un c√≥digo y yo lo acept√©. Inmediatamente, ingresaron a mi WhatsApp, me qued√© sin mi cuenta, me bloquearon la l√≠nea y est√°n estafando a las personas‚Äù, cont√≥ Pineda.
La mujer asegur√≥ que dentro de sus contactos ten√≠a m√°s de 5.000 clientes, a quienes lees escribieron para estafarlos: "Les preguntan qu√© reservas necesitan, porque la gente escribe a mi n√∫mero. Ellos se hacen pasar por m√≠, les env√≠an cotizaciones y les hacen consignar plata a las personas. L√≥gicamente, apenas consignan, bloquean los n√∫meros‚Äù.
[@unatalgorritos]Ir con mucho cuidado porfa üôèüèªüôèüèª //[#sabiasque][#noticia][#noticias][#noticiastiktok][#noticiasen1minuto][#videoinformativo][#aprendeentiktok][#aprendecontiktok][#estafa][#estafas][#alerta][#ultimahora][#datoscuriosos][#datospertubadores][#datosinteresantes][#interesting][#interesante][#curiosidades][#perturbador][#parati][#fyp][#viral][#trendy][#trending][#xzybca][#spain][#espa√±a][‚ô¨ Paris - Else]
As√≠ puede identificar si un mensaje de WhatsApp es una estafa
Respecto a casos como estos, un experto de seguridad cibern√©tica cont√≥ c√≥mo identificar un fraude a trav√©s de la aplicaci√≥n de mensajer√≠a. Estos son los puntos a tener en cuenta cuando le llegue un mensaje de un n√∫mero desconocido:
- N√∫mero que tenga el "+57", alertando que se trata de un tel√©fono com√∫n y no de la aplicaci√≥n oficial.
- Una imagen con el logo de WhatsApp que no est√° centrada y tiene baja calidad.
- "Nombre" de 'support' con un emoji de candado, algo muy dif√≠cil de detectar.
- Uso de negrilla en todo el mensaje, para que parezca 'oficial'.
- Uso de lenguaje de posible 'ataque' a su privacidad para generar ansiedad.
- Texto punteado para indicar el supuesto c√≥digo que se enviar√°.
Un detalle clave de este modus operandi es el uso de lenguaje alarmante y urgente, como frases en negrita y advertencias sobre posibles ataques. Esto busca desorientar a las v√≠ctimas y presionarlas para que act√∫en sin pensar.
Otro indicio es que WhatsApp nunca solicita este tipo de datos a trav√©s de mensajes en la aplicaci√≥n; los procesos de verificaci√≥n suelen realizarse dentro de pantallas espec√≠ficas.
Publicidad
El experto recomienda ignorar y bloquear cualquier mensaje de este tipo, as√≠ como activar la verificaci√≥n en dos pasos para proteger la cuenta. La educaci√≥n digital y la precauci√≥n son las mejores herramientas para evitar caer en estas trampas.

author: lacayo
title: #32 La UCO estrecha el cerco por corrupci√≥n sobre Ana Mill√°n, vicepresidenta de la Asamblea de Madrid
text:
Portada
mis comunidades
otras secciones
[#1](c1#c-1) No temen nada, despu√©s de esto vendr√° el juez en n√≥mina o desde dentro de la uco alg√∫n corrupto cometer√° alguna irregularidad que invalide pruebas y actuaciones. Para ellos "libertad" significa "libertad para seguir delinquiendo".
pero no te lo pierdas que la gentuza de sus votantes, esos que ponen a narcos en alcald√≠as y no paran de tragar orines de los corruptos a los que defienden con u√±as y dientes, son los primeros en indignarse con casos de corrupci√≥n inventados mientras votan a los que sobornaron a sallas y adanero, se cagan en las instituciones montando kitchens y comprando jueces y tienen su sede reformada con dinero negro.
Son los votacorruptos que est√°n jodiendo Espa√±a, y algunos todav√≠a creen que van dando lecciones de espa√±olidad.
Atentos a esto:
""""Solo el Tribunal Superior de Justicia de Madrid puede imputar a Ana Mill√°n porque Isabel D√≠az Ayuso la afor√≥ las pasadas elecciones a pesar de que ya hab√≠a comparecido como investigada en Navalcarnero, al escogerla como diputada y nombrarla vicepresidenta primera de la Asamblea. La juez pide que Ana Mill√°n sea imputada por cohecho, tr√°fico de influencias, prevaricaci√≥n y fraude a la administraci√≥n.""""
La mafia del PP. Los que quieren que los
soldados del PP jueces se elijan entre ellos.
[#17](c17#c-17) √âsta justicia, secuestrada por los socio-comunistas, siempre ataca al c√≠rculo de gente que apoya, ama, convive y reparte con la perseguidora y fustigadora de "zurdos de mierda"...
A ver. En la trama hay un hermano, un novio, un √°tico... Solo le falta un maserati para ser igualita que su jefa.
Pero a esta la van a empapelar bien.
